Question: What are we trying to do?

We are trying to find the templates or patterns which are being used in the text.

Below are the steps to be followed to resolve the above problem.

Step 1: We will be loading the text file in a string format.

Step 2: We will be doing a split function on the loaded data such that we get one sentence per element of the list.

Step 3: We will be splitting the sentence into words using the word_tokenize method.

Step 4: We will be tagging the word tokens using the pos_tag method of the nltk.

Step 5: We will be removing the stop words from the sentence.
